verses.verse: אַשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> ALEPH Blessed תְמִֽימֵי־ <S%H8549><s%> [are] the undefiled דָ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way הַֽ֝הֹלְכִ֗ים <S%H1980><s%> who walk בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> in the law יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3069><s%> God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> Blessed נֹצְרֵ֥י <S%H5341><s%> [are] they that keep עֵדֹתָ֗יו <S%H5713><s%> his testimonies בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> him with the whole heart יִדְרְשֽׁוּהוּ׃ <S%H1875><s%> [and that] seek
אַ֭ף <S%H637><s%> also לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> no פָעֲל֣וּ <S%H6466><s%> They also do עַוְלָ֑ה <S%H5766><s%> no iniquity בִּדְרָכָ֥יו <S%H1870><s%> in his ways הָלָֽכוּ׃ <S%H1980><s%> they walk
אַ֭תָּה <S%H859><s%> You צִוִּ֥יתָה <S%H6680><s%> Thou hast commanded פִקֻּדֶ֗יךָ <S%H6490><s%> thy precepts לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> [us] to keep מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> diligently
אַ֭חֲלַי <S%H305><s%> O that יִכֹּ֥נוּ <S%H3559><s%> were directed דְרָכָ֗י <S%H1870><s%> my ways לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <S%H8104><s%> to keep חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2706><s%> thy statutes

אָ֥ז <S%H227><s%> Then לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not אֵב֑וֹשׁ <S%H954><s%> Then shall I not be ashamed בְּ֝הַבִּיטִ֗י <S%H5027><s%> when I have respect אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> upon כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> unto all thy commandments

א֭וֹדְךָ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise בְּיֹ֣שֶׁר <S%H3476><s%> thee with uprightness לֵבָ֑ב <S%H3824><s%> of heart בְּ֝לָמְדִ֗י <S%H3925><s%> when I shall have learned מִשְׁפְּטֵ֥י <S%H4941><s%> judgments צִדְקֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6664><s%> thy righteous

אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֶּ֥יךָ <S%H2706><s%> thy statutes אֶשְׁמֹ֑ר <S%H8104><s%> I will keep אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּעַזְבֵ֥נִי <S%H5800><s%> O forsake עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> not מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> me not utterly

בַּמֶּ֣ה <S%H4100><s%> How יְזַכֶּה־ <S%H2135><s%> cleanse נַּ֭עַר <S%H5288><s%> BETH Wherewithal shall a young man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָרְח֑וֹ <S%H734><s%> his way לִ֝שְׁמֹ֗ר <S%H8104><s%> beward כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> [thereto] according to thy word

בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> With my whole heart דְרַשְׁתִּ֑יךָ <S%H1875><s%> have I sought אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּ֝שְׁגֵּ֗נִי <S%H7686><s%> thee O let me not wander מִמִּצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> from thy commandments

בְּ֭לִבִּי <S%H3820><s%> in mine heart צָפַ֣נְתִּי <S%H6845><s%> have I hid אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H565><s%> Thy word לְ֝מַ֗עַן <S%H4616><s%> because of לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> may not אֶֽחֱטָא־ <S%H2398><s%> that I might not sin לָֽךְ׃
בָּר֖וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God לַמְּדֵ֥נִי <S%H3925><s%> teach חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2706><s%> me thy statutes
בִּשְׂפָתַ֥י <S%H8193><s%> With my lips סִפַּ֑רְתִּי <S%H5608><s%> have I declared כֹּ֝֗ל <S%H3605><s%> of All מִשְׁפְּטֵי־ <S%H4941><s%> all the judgments פִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> of thy mouth

בְּדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way עֵדְוֹתֶ֥יךָ <S%H5715><s%> of thy testimonies שַׂ֗שְׂתִּי <S%H7797><s%> I have rejoiced כְּעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> as [much as] in כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הֽוֹן׃ <S%H1952><s%> all riches
בְּפִקֻּדֶ֥יךָ <S%H6490><s%> in thy precepts אָשִׂ֑יחָה <S%H7878><s%> I will meditate וְ֝אַבִּ֗יטָה <S%H5027><s%> and have respect אֹרְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H734><s%> unto thy ways

בְּחֻקֹּתֶ֥יךָ <S%H2708><s%> myself in thy statutes אֶֽשְׁתַּעֲשָׁ֑ע <S%H8173><s%> I will delight לֹ֭א <S%H3808><s%> shall not אֶשְׁכַּ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> I will not forget דְּבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> thy word

גְּמֹ֖ל <S%H1580><s%> GIMEL Deal bountifully עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> with עַבְדְּךָ֥ <S%H5650><s%> with thy servant אֶֽחְיֶ֗ה <S%H2421><s%> [that] I may live וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֥ה <S%H8104><s%> and keep דְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> thy word
גַּל־ <S%H1540><s%> Open עֵינַ֥י <S%H5869><s%> thou mine eyes וְאַבִּ֑יטָה <S%H5027><s%> that I may behold נִ֝פְלָא֗וֹת <S%H6381><s%> wondrous things מִתּוֹרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H8451><s%> out of thy law

גֵּ֣ר <S%H1616><s%> I [am] a stranger אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> in בָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the earth אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּסְתֵּ֥ר <S%H5641><s%> hide מִ֝מֶּ֗נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at מִצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> not thy commandments

גָּרְסָ֣ה <S%H1638><s%> breaketh נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> My soul לְתַאֲבָ֑ה <S%H8375><s%> for the longing אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> After מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ <S%H4941><s%> [that it hath] unto thy judgments בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵֽת׃ <S%H6256><s%> at all times

גָּ֭עַרְתָּ <S%H1605><s%> Thou hast rebuked זֵדִ֣ים <S%H2086><s%> the proud אֲרוּרִ֑ים <S%H779><s%> [that are] cursed הַ֝שֹּׁגִים <S%H7686><s%> which do err מִמִּצְוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4687><s%> from thy commandments

גַּ֣ל <S%H1556><s%> Remove מֵֽ֭עָלַי <S%H5921><s%> and חֶרְפָּ֣ה <S%H2781><s%> from me reproach וָב֑וּז <S%H937><s%> and contempt כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for עֵדֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H5713><s%> thy testimonies נָצָֽרְתִּי׃ <S%H5341><s%> for I have kept

גַּ֤ם <S%H1571><s%> Even יָֽשְׁב֣וּ <S%H3427><s%> also did sit שָׂ֭רִים <S%H8269><s%> Princes בִּ֣י נִדְבָּ֑רוּ <S%H1696><s%> [and] speak עַ֝בְדְּךָ֗ <S%H5650><s%> against me [but] thy servant יָשִׂ֥יחַ <S%H7878><s%> did meditate בְּחֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2706><s%> in thy statutes
גַּֽם־ <S%H1571><s%> also עֵ֭דֹתֶיךָ <S%H5713><s%> Thy testimonies שַׁעֲשֻׁעָ֗י <S%H8191><s%> also [are] my delight אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H582><s%> another עֲצָתִֽי׃ <S%H6098><s%> advice

דָּֽבְקָ֣ה <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth לֶעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> unto the dust נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> DALETH My soul חַ֝יֵּ֗נִי <S%H2421><s%> quicken כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> thou me according to thy word
דְּרָכַ֣י <S%H1870><s%> my ways סִ֭פַּרְתִּי <S%H5608><s%> I have declared וַֽתַּעֲנֵ֗נִי <S%H6030><s%> and thou heardest לַמְּדֵ֥נִי <S%H3925><s%> me teach חֻקֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H2706><s%> me thy statutes

דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> the way פִּקּוּדֶ֥יךָ <S%H6490><s%> of thy precepts הֲבִינֵ֑נִי <S%H995><s%> Make me to understand וְ֝אָשִׂ֗יחָה <S%H7878><s%> so shall I talk בְּנִפְלְאוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H6381><s%> of thy wondrous works

דָּלְפָ֣ה <S%H1811><s%> melteth נַ֭פְשִׁי <S%H5315><s%> My soul מִתּוּגָ֑ה <S%H8424><s%> for heaviness קַ֝יְּמֵ֗נִי <S%H6965><s%> strengthen כִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> thou me according unto thy word

דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> from me the way שֶׁ֭קֶר <S%H8267><s%> of lying הָסֵ֣ר <S%H5493><s%> Remove מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> at וְֽתוֹרָתְךָ֥ <S%H8451><s%> and grant me thy law חָנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2603><s%> graciously
דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> the way אֱמוּנָ֥ה <S%H530><s%> of truth בָחָ֑רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> I have chosen מִשְׁפָּטֶ֥יךָ <S%H4941><s%> thy judgments שִׁוִּֽיתִי׃ <S%H7737><s%> have I laid
דָּבַ֥קְתִּי <S%H1692><s%> I have stuck בְעֵֽדְוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H5715><s%> unto thy testimonies יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> God אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תְּבִישֵֽׁנִי׃ <S%H954><s%> put me not to shame

דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <S%H1870><s%> the way מִצְוֹתֶ֥יךָ <S%H4687><s%> of thy commandments אָר֑וּץ <S%H7323><s%> I will run כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for תַרְחִ֣יב <S%H7337><s%> when thou shalt enlarge לִבִּֽי׃ <S%H3820><s%> my heart

הוֹרֵ֣נִי <S%H3384><s%> HE Teach יְ֭הוָה <S%H3069><s%> God דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> the way חֻקֶּ֗יךָ <S%H2706><s%> of thy statutes וְאֶצְּרֶ֥נָּה <S%H5341><s%> and I shall keep עֵֽקֶב׃ <S%H6118><s%> it [unto] the end

הֲ֭בִינֵנִי <S%H995><s%> Give me understanding וְאֶצְּרָ֥ה <S%H5341><s%> and I shall keep תֽוֹרָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H8451><s%> thy law וְאֶשְׁמְרֶ֥נָּה <S%H8104><s%> yea I shall observe בְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> it with [my] whole heart

הַ֭דְרִיכֵנִי <S%H1869><s%> Make me to go בִּנְתִ֣יב <S%H5410><s%> in the path מִצְוֹתֶ֑יךָ <S%H4687><s%> of thy commandments כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ב֥וֹ חָפָֽצְתִּי׃ <S%H2654><s%> for therein do I delight

הַט־ <S%H5186><s%> Incline לִ֭בִּי <S%H3820><s%> my heart אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עֵדְוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H5715><s%> unto thy testimonies וְאַ֣ל <S%H408><s%> nay אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and בָּֽצַע׃ <S%H1215><s%> and not to covetousness

הַעֲבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> Turn away עֵ֭ינַי <S%H5869><s%> mine eyes מֵרְא֣וֹת <S%H7200><s%> from beholding שָׁ֑וְא <S%H7723><s%> vanity בִּדְרָכֶ֥ךָ <S%H1870><s%> thou me in thy way חַיֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> [and] quicken
הָקֵ֣ם <S%H6965><s%> Stablish לְ֭עַבְדְּךָ <S%H5650><s%> unto thy servant אִמְרָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H565><s%> thy word אֲ֝שֶׁ֗ר <S%H834><s%> which לְיִרְאָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3374><s%> who [is devoted] to thy fear

הַעֲבֵ֣ר <S%H5674><s%> Turn away חֶ֭רְפָּתִי <S%H2781><s%> my reproach אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which יָגֹ֑רְתִּי <S%H3025><s%> which I fear כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> For מִשְׁפָּטֶ֣יךָ <S%H4941><s%> for thy judgments טוֹבִֽים׃ <S%H2896><s%> [are] good

הִ֭נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold תָּאַ֣בְתִּי <S%H8373><s%> Behold I have longed לְפִקֻּדֶ֑יךָ <S%H6490><s%> after thy precepts בְּצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <S%H6666><s%> me in thy righteousness חַיֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2421><s%> quicken

וִֽיבֹאֻ֣נִי <S%H935><s%> come חֲסָדֶ֣ךָ <S%H2617><s%> VAU Let thy mercies יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God תְּ֝שֽׁוּעָתְךָ֗ <S%H8668><s%> [even] thy salvation כְּאִמְרָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H565><s%> according to thy word

וְאֶֽעֱנֶ֣ה <S%H6030><s%> to answer חֹרְפִ֣י <S%H2778><s%> him that reproacheth דָבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> So shall I have wherewith כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֝טַחְתִּי <S%H982><s%> me for I trust בִּדְבָרֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1697><s%> in thy word

וְֽאַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תַּצֵּ֬ל <S%H5337><s%> And take מִפִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> out of my mouth דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> not the word אֱמֶ֣ת <S%H571><s%> of truth עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> utterly כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for לְמִשְׁפָּטֶ֣ךָ <S%H4941><s%> in thy judgments יִחָֽלְתִּי׃ <S%H3176><s%> for I have hoped
וְאֶשְׁמְרָ֖ה <S%H8104><s%> So shall I keep תוֹרָתְךָ֥ <S%H8451><s%> thy law תָמִ֗יד <S%H8548><s%> continually לְעוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever
וְאֶתְהַלְּכָ֥ה <S%H1980><s%> And I will walk בָרְחָבָ֑ה <S%H7342><s%> at liberty כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for פִקֻּדֶ֣יךָ <S%H6490><s%> thy precepts דָרָֽשְׁתִּי׃ <S%H1875><s%> for I seek

וַאֲדַבְּרָ֣ה <S%H1696><s%> I will speak בְ֭עֵדֹתֶיךָ <S%H5713><s%> of thy testimonies נֶ֥גֶד <S%H5048><s%> before מְלָכִ֗ים <S%H4428><s%> also before kings וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֵבֽוֹשׁ׃ <S%H954><s%> and will not be ashamed
וְאֶשְׁתַּֽעֲשַׁ֥ע <S%H8173><s%> And I will delight בְּמִצְוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4687><s%> myself in thy commandments אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> Which אָהָֽבְתִּי׃ <S%H157><s%> which I have loved
